CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 14, 1953, pg. 15, reads: "Herron Hill Cheer Leaders - When Herron Hill won the Junior High School basketball championship last Friday, these lovely young ladies were there to cheer the cage stars to victory. Left to right: Dorothy Ann Paul, Joiler Penn, and Vera Thompson.  Standing: Jean Wilds, Muriel Hill, Jean Brown and Jocelyn Ann Fountaine. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of seven Herron Hill Junior High School cheerleaders, kneeling from left: Dorothy Ann Paul, Joiler Penn, and Vera Thompson (Matthews) posing with megaphones; standing: Jean Wilds, Muriel Hill, Jean Brown, and Jocelyn Ann Fountaine
CatSubject_tab: Girls--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Cheerleaders--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Uniforms--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Herron Hill Junior High School (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
